name: Blackstone Divine Lumberjack (Fighter 12 / Weapon Master 25 / Paladin 3)
author: Yunim

posts.author: Yunim
posts.content:
This is a PvM melee build made specifically for the server Blackstone Keep, several changes would need to be made to adapt it for a different server.
It is a more balanced version of a build that I have previously posted on the BSK forum, it sacrifices damage for increased survivability. [https://blackstonekeep.com/viewtopic.php?f=25&t=3608]
The combination of Divine Might and Weapon Master bonuses makes it a decent damage dealer against most monsters regardless of DI/DR.
At level 40 this build has a Devastating Critical DC of 38 (44 with +12 STR).
From level 14 onward this build can use all divine wands, however it lacks UMD and so is unable to use most scrolls or arcane wands.
When adapting this build for another server Blind Fight should be moved from level 28 to much earlier in the build.
Any weapon can be used with this build but dwarven waraxes are the best choice for BSK.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
Are you planning to dual-wield dwarven waraxes?  That will look really cool, but it will lower your AB by 4.  Normally, when you dual-wield with the dual-wield feats, your AB is lowered by 2, but that is only if your off-hand weapon is 1 size smaller than you are (small or tiny for a medium race, or tiny-only for a small race).  If your off-hand weapon is too big, like a dwarven waraxe, your AB is lowered by an additional 2 points.

Since you are taking Exotic Weapons already, you could dual-wield kukris and get 2 more AB and lots of chances at Dev Critting.  Or, you could drop dual-wielding and go for a dwarven waraxe and shield for better AB and better AC, and you could then move some of those pre-epic feats out of epic levels, and add Armor Skin and more Great Strength.

If you want to get the most out of Devastating Critical, you will want a weapon with more crits, rather than one with a higher critical multiplier.

With CHA 14, Divine Might will add only +2 damage.  If you can max your CHA (as well as your STR, which is a priority because it also adds to your damage, AB, and Dev Crit DC), that becomes +8 damage.

posts.author: Yunim
posts.content:
Most of your suggestions work well when modifying the build for other servers Empyre65, but this is built specifically for Blackstone Keep and the build choices reflect that.
Valerfor's Figh10/WM25/Pal5 is a better build on most servers, and is a better starting point for adapting a build to most servers.

Dwarven waraxes are chosen over kukris because there is a dwarven waraxe on the server that does magical damage, which most melee weapons (including kukris) don't have.
Devastating Critical has been modified on the server so that it doubles damage on critical hits rather than the vanilla save or die effect. However the main motivation for getting the feat is because of a server specific reason rather than the bonus damage.
If needed the Epic Toughness taken at level 40 could be swapped for Armor Skin, however on BSK 20 HP is worth more than 2 AC for most PvM builds.
I assume that anyone using this build will have access to +12 STR, +12 CON, and +12 CHA from items. With those stats it has 8 damage from Divine Might and does 32 on critical hits, compared to the 2/8 damage when unbuffed.
